description:
This course gives you key insights into the theory and practice of composition - using a series of clear and engaging lectures combined with practical examples of composition in film and photography

The course covers major principles and rules of composition, and shows how film and photo composition techniques are merging to the benefit of both disciplines.

You're taught by veteran film director and passionate photographer Paul Jenkins, who is bringing to bear more than twenty years experience making films worldwide into this course. 

You'll be learning what you thought you knew about composition and take your images and videos to a whole new level because every frame will tell the story you intended to tell!

Your photos and films will benefit greatly as a result. 

In terms of quality - and therefore the potential visibility of your work to the public at large - creative and dynamic composition is one of the core skills you should seek and develop for as long as you wish to wield a camera!
title: Composition Insights: Elevate Your Film and Photography
